channel.title: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?
channel.description: How often do you guys use G minor? Since it's the default Auxy key I don't often use it as I almost always change all settings.

item.title: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?
item.dc:creator: PlutoPower
item.description:
Every time I forget to change the key signature.

Read full topic

item.title: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?
item.dc:creator: W7SEGUY
item.description:
I kept on making everything with the default settings. Even sticking with the random instruments. One day I saw the options to change key and bpm. But I still kept on making everything in G minor because to my ears it sounds the best. But I do occasionally change the bpm and almost always switch instruments.

Read full topic

item.description:
Fun fact, there was a time when we randomised the key for new projects, but then we learned that kicks tuned to G usually sounds really good, so we decided that was a good starting point.

item.source: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?

item.title: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
TBH, I don’t actually know.

I ignore the key setting, and always switch to Chromatic at the start of each new project.

From there, I’ll often already have something in my head, e.g. a melody, that I need to quickly get down, and flow out from there. But, I literally have no idea which key or chord/scale I’m working in, although I know it varies from project to project. I never pay attention to the notes shown on the piano roll.

I just feel my way through it, ‘playing’ by ear. Never felt the need to be more self-aware about the music I’m making – at least, in terms of being more thoughtful about keys, scales, etc….

Read full topic
item.source: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?

item.title: How often do you use G minor, the default Auxy key?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I always try to go all over with my keys. I like using major mode a bit but I’ll usually keep it in minor, should use harmonic minor more honestly as it’s what I’m used to xD anyway, I tend to use either Eb or Bb minor, A major and sometimes C# minor, but my absolute favorite is B minor.

Read full topic

Then I compare and contrast
